snippet.title: House of Golf 2 | Game play Trailer with Developer Commentary
snippet.description:
House of Golf 2 is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X/S and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store)

Starlight Games development team shows you a sneak preview of House of Golf 2, as well as talking about some of the work that went into bringing this stunning game to light in Unreal Engine 5.

This demo gives an insight to the teamwork and dedication at the Starlight Games studio as well as the passion staff have for creating and developing games.

House of Golf 2 has many golf balls to choose from along with over 100 incredibly fun courses in visually stunning house environments with fun obstacles, traps, and hazards.

Play in single-player or with family and friends with up to 4-player multiplayer, whether at a party or playing competitively with regular tournaments and leader boards.

Free Cam feature allows players to navigate the route around courses and help determine a strategy.

Add to your Wish list on:

    PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10010541

    Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/p/9MWGJVHXVPZF

    Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2914390/House_of_Golf_2/

    EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/house-of-golf-2-f346a4

We can’t wait to hear what levels you’re looking forward to playing most.
 
Join our Community!
Website: https://www.starlightgames.co.uk

X: https://x.com/slgliverpool

Instagram: https://tinyurl.com/IGStarlight

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@starlightgamesuk
